Pendant.EffectString: Gain <[BagIn(极夜龙(灾年);1)]>#YearBegin  <[Global,Health,=1]><[BagIn(长夜漫漫(灾年);1)]>  # YearEnd <[SelfPendant,SpecialVal,1]><{SelfPendant,SpecialVal,Equal,3}[DestroyCard(Filter(Bag'(Name'Contain'(灾年))))][DestroyItem(Filter(Land'(Name'Contain'(灾年))))][DiscardDestroy(Name'Contain'(灾年);-1)]>
